comments:
Using Eclipse SDK 3.0 RC1.

Opened a workspace that was previously used by M7 and M8.

Code formatting wasn't working as expected.

Went to menu and selected "Windows -> Preferences".

On Preferences dialog, chose "Java -> Code Style -> Code Formatter"

Error dialog appeared with the following message...

> Unable to create the selected preference page.
>
> Reason:
> Plug-in "org.eclipse.jdt.ui" was unable to instantiate class
> "org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.preferences.CodeFormatterPreferencePage"

(I have pasted the stacktrace from the log at the bottom of this report)

This error does not occur if working in a workspace created by/for RC1.

Stack Trace:
